Summary: Strange formation of lights out my window.
divs: Sighting DetailsDifferent groups of lights. different colors, shapes and glow patterns. the video shows then gon at certain points, but I was just repositioning myself. I'm not sure how long they stayed. I left the window. There is an airport around 6-8 miles away, but not in that direction at all I saw 1 UFO around 12 years ago in Marco Island, FLA. Totally different over the bay. Triangle shaped. Watched that one for 45 minutes until it shot away horizontally so fast I couldn't believe it. It had blinking lights, but I can't remember the color.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Chesterfield
